Question: In a 35–3 victory against the Cincinnati Bengals, this person threw 3 TD passes while completing 26 of 32 passes for 277 yards.
Hints: This person won AFC Offensive Player of the Week for the 2nd time this season (18th time, career).
At the end of the regular season this person was awarded his fourth MVP, breaking the NFL record for most MVPs by a single player.
This person did not bounce back from the loss well.
